fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Indocrinate a player during the day, immediately kicking them from that day chat, and adding the following goal to them along with their original:
> Eliminate all who oppose the overmind before another faction wins.
- Fucking assassinate another player, making an indocrinated player of your choice deal a Basic attack to them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Any night visits on you that are not Unstoppable/Overkill attacks will automatically fail.
- You have a private chat with anyone you indocrinate

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who oppose the overmind before another faction wins.
